import "./FinalPrice.css" import { useDate } from "../../context/date-context" import { DateSelector } from "../DateSelector/DateSelector" export const FinalPrice = ({singleHotel}) =>{ const {price,rating} = singleHotel const {guests} = useDate() return(

Rs. {price}night

star {rating}

Guests

{guests} guests
Rs. {price} x 2 nights Rs {price * 2}
Service Fee Rs 200
Total Rs {price+200}
) }
